item.title: drop into an interactive interpreter from a script
item.description: Twice this weekend I’ve found that I would like to drop from a script into the interactive prompt and have the environment and context available to debug and test. Once in Ruby and once in Python. I do most active development with an interpreter open, but copying and pasting into the interpreter quickly becomes tedious. import pdb # ... pdb.set_trace()require 'rubygems' require 'ruby-debug' # ... debugger I will certainly be using these extensively at the very least to test my data-structures.
